snippet: More than 218,000 made the sea journey to Europe last month, the United Nations agency for refugees said, compared with about 216,000 all last year.
abstract: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees reports over 218,000 migrants crossed Mediterranean to reach Europe in October, record monthly total surpassing 2014 yearly total of 216,000 people.
lead_paragraph: More than 218,000 made the sea journey to Europe last month, the United Nations agency for refugees said, compared with about 216,000 all last year.

headline.main: Migrant Crossings of Mediterranean in October Surpass Total for All of 2014
headline.print_headline: Europe; Migrant Crossings of Mediterranean in October Surpass Total for All of 2014

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
